Combination Bonus Charts
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher DS Archive (DS): Japanese DS Games Archive: Monster Farm DS: FAQ (basic essentials, read this first!): Combination Bonus Charts
By Thorr on Tuesday, October 16, 2007 - 11:05 am:

These charts show some conditions which give bonus points to your stats when combining.

Highest stat for both monsters is same stat50%Up
2nd Highest stat for both monsters is same stat30%up
3rd Highest stat for both monsters is same stat20%up
4th Highest stat for both monsters is same stat10%up
5th Highest stat for both monsters is same stat20%up
Lowest stat for both monsters is same stat30%up


Identically ranked monsters
S10%up
A4%up
B3%up
C2%up
D1%up
ENo Gain


Weight
Both Fat 5% Up
Both Skinny 5% up


LOYALTY PENALTY
Loyalty below 20100% DOWN
Loyalty Below 5070% DOWN
Loyalty Below 7020% Down
